name: producthunt_bulk_search
description: Search multiple products on Product Hunt in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling producthunt_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'AI writing,project management,design tool')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[data-test="post-item"], [class*="post-item"], a[href*="/posts/"]'); const seen = new Set(); for (let i = 0; i < items.length && results.length < 5; i++) { const el = items[i]; const nameEl = el.querySelector('h3, strong, [class*="title"]'); const href = el.getAttribute('href') || (el.querySelector('a[href*="/posts/"]') ? el.querySelector('a[href*="/posts/"]').href : ''); if (seen.has(href) || !href) continue; seen.add(href); const taglineEl = el.querySelector('p, [class*="tagline"]'); const upvotesEl = el.querySelector('[class*="vote"] span'); results.push({ name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', tagline: taglineEl ? taglineEl.textContent.trim() : '', upvotes: upvotesEl ? upvotesEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: href.startsWith('http') ? href : 'https://www.producthunt.com' + href }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
